title: Investigation of the insecticidal potential of curcumin derivatives that target the Helicoverpa armigera sterol carrier protein-2
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Naeema Kausar, Wayne Thomas Shier, Mahmood Ahmed, Maryam, Norah A. Albekairi, Abdulrahman Alshammari, Muhammad Saleem, Muhammad Imran, Muhammad Muddassar
